title: Emerald Radiance: Diamond & Pearl Hanging Jhumka
features: Elegant cascade design with floral and paisley motifs, prong setting for emerald and diamonds. The design also has Hyderabadi influence
occasions: and special occasions. It is also suitable to wear as a casual statement piece with modern attire.
description: A unique blend of traditional Indian design with modern aesthetics. High-quality gemstones and expert craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty. The combination of emerald, diamond, and pearl creates a striking and memorable look. Adds a touch of Hyderabadi luxury.
